choose.when: FID, FUSER_NAME, FUSER_CODE, FUSER_TYPE, FNICKNAME, FROLE_ID, FORG_ID, FPOST_ID, FENABLE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FLOCK_STATE, FONLINE, FSAFETY, FINCEPT_TIME, FEXPIRY_TIME, FLOGIN_TIME, FLOGIN_COUNT, FCLIENT_IP, FPASSWORD, FREAL_NAME, FSEX, FBIRTHDAY, FTELEPHONE, FMOBILE, FJOB, FPOSTCODE, FEMAIL, FADDRESS, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_user
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_user where FID in (#{listItem})
